definition: words of politeness/politesse/decorous talking/talk with propriety
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Mary was leading up to a request for money with his kind words.
sentences.chinese: 瑪莉說了一些客氣話是爲開口要錢作準備。

sentences.english: But her natural politeness could not hide the distress in her voice.
sentences.chinese: 但是這些隨口而出的客氣話未能掩飾她話語中的不安。

sentences.english: He confused me with a deluge of polite words.
sentences.chinese: 他說了一大堆客氣話使我不知所措。

sentences.english: Two madams said a few polite remarkses and sent to the doorway to 11 Niangs.
sentences.chinese: 二夫人說了幾句客氣話，把十一娘送到了門口。

sentences.english: People said many kind words about Kay Yow.
sentences.chinese: 人們關於凱佑說了很多客氣話。
